page.title: 13Life by the Wye-by Richard.
page.content: Life by this river is fairly exciting in winter.This year 1985 is the first time I have ever seen the river frozen right over from the left side to the right side.In the summer people jump off the bridge into the river.Last year, 1984 a man jumped into the river and cracked his head open,broke his arm,leg and wrist.This is a dangerous place for swimming and jumping.Under the bridge there are whirlpools.There is a house near the river which gives canoe lessons and hires them out for use in the summer.Lots of tourists visit the river in summer and I'm afraid they often leave a lot of horrid litter.The ice_cream van does a roaring trade.No motor boats are allowed on the river.It is great fun living near this beautiful river.I think I am a very lucky boy.
